## Who is working with you?

Biplabendu Das, fondly called `BILLU`, obtained his Ph.D. in bioinformatics, 
following which he did postdoctoral research at Stanford University. 

Billu works as a Data Scientist / Data Engineer for two nationwide, 
longitudinal studies aimed at understanding brain & cognitive development in 
adolescents ([ABCD Study](https://abcdstudy.org/)) & newborn babies 
([HBCD Study](https://hbcdstudy.org/)).

## Experience

1. Data Scientist/Engineer, *J. Craig Venter Institute*, Apr 2025 - present

2. Data Scientist/Engineer, *UC San Diego*, Aug 2023 - Mar 2025

2. Postdoctoral Researcher, *Stanford University*, May 2022 - Oct 2023

:::
